# gsoc18saga

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/jolars/gsoc18saga.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/jolars/gsoc18saga)

This repository hosts the source code and presentation of the tests
for the Google Summer of Code 2018 project
[SAGA sparse linear models](https://github.com/rstats-gsoc/gsoc2018/wiki/SAGA-sparse-linear-models).

Please see the [vignette](https://jolars.github.io/gsoc18saga/articles/test-results.html)
for the resuls on the tests or browse this repository for the
source code to these tests.
